They removed this ride because it gave them a lot of problems. Half of the 
time it wouldn't work correctly. So they moved it. They also moved the de 
ja vu in six flags chicago to silverwood theme park in north idaho. It's 
now called the aftershock. If you want to ride it again that's where you 
have to go.
